jardim » Pokémon

Pokémon

A wiki page all about Pokémon.

Pokémon is a video game franchise created by Satoshi Tajiri that began in 1996 with the release of Pokémon Red and Green. It revolutionized the gaming industry, with its unique take on monster collecting and RPG battling, and inadvertently revived the life cycle of the Game Boy, nearly a decade after its release. With over 1,000 different species to collect and train, Pokémon is a global phenomenon and one very close to my heart.

Related terms: gaming | Japan
